channel.title: A Few Problems with Fixing my Source/Client
channel.description: I am trying to fix a few things in my client and I need help. Here they are: 1. How do I change what it says on the "Quest Tab"? 2. When anyone logs on a picture of the "Lumbridge Guide" pops up in the text box and says " Hello, welcome to (server name)". How can I change that?

item.title: A Few Problems with Fixing my Source/Client
item.dc:creator: @The_PvP_King The PvP King
item.description:
@The_PvP_King wrote:

Base is the source… What source are you using?

Read full topic

@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

I am trying to fix a few things in my client and I need help. Here they are:

  1. How do I change what it says on the “Quest Tab”?
  2. When anyone logs on a picture of the “Lumbridge Guide” pops up in the text box and says " Hello, welcome to (server name)". How can I change that?
